Visit

I wanted to build a search engine that showed results in real time or "on change". I figured out how to use a connection string in a query to receive data. Unsplash's API was pretty challenging but it works!

Visit

When I learned about the useState hook in React, I was ecstatic. I then built this app to showcase how it can be used to make dynamic components. My favorite part is the style. I designed this as a retro themed monitor.

SCSS

Firebase E-Commerce Template. This project is more of a personal tool. I am getting more familiar with GraphQL and implementing global state management like Redux. For backend, I use Firebase for it's auth and in-house database.

BeLeaf Mobile App. This mobile app would allow users to plot a point on a map of their local park or nature preserve, and plant a tree common to that area. I am getting more familiar with GraphQL and implementing global state.
